page.title: 07By Skelton Grange
page.content: Half way down{Knostrop Road}we stopped to have some photographs taken. When we set off again we picked some{wild flowers.}It was rather a pleasant walk and the weather wasn't all that bad. We went past the{sewage works.}We couldn't see them, but we could smell them. When we got to the bottom of the road we couldn't go any further because there was a{security barrier, so we walked all the way back again. We decided to walk round the {industrial estate,}back to school. We went past quite a few{factories}and {derelict buildings,}then we carried on walking onto our school playing field. I told my mum and dad about all the factories and also about a place where a man told us off for going over private property.
